summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3981 for the improvement of Franklin Avenue from Harvard Avenue North to a connection with the existing pavement on Fuhrman Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48442 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
